text: @RealJamesWoods I mean NO disrespect at all 4 Mr. Floyd.His unnecessary death was horrendous, but, since I assume, we are no longer counting deaths from other causes d/t COVID19,can we get a true death count on deaths actually d/t COVID19? @realDonaldTrump @JesseBWatters @TomFitton @JaniceDean
